a.span: NY State of Health Letter to Families
Protect yourself from COVID-19 & stop the spread of germs

h3.span: Brookfield Central School District Information Regarding COVID-19, School Closure & Related Resources

p.span: Please click on links at left for more information regarding School Closure and other related information to help keep your family safe and healthy.
We anticipate contacting you many times over the next several days as we make and modify plans.

In addition to automated phone calls, we will do our very best to post information here on our website and on our facebook page. Please be aware that the district does not monitor our facebook page for questions. If you have questions, please contact district personnel directly. We ask that you please be patient.
